flashlightgen: A flashlight can be used as a source of light, hold it in hand and turn it on with primary use key (default: right click) or special use key (default: T) when it's in the inventory!
flashlightT1:
A retro flashlight which provides a small amount of light. 
-> narrow spotlight, low intensity, electronic
flashlightT2:
-> unlocked at level 18 
A flashlight with a much brighter beam of light. 
-> narrow spotlight, medium intensity, electronic
flashlightT3:
-> unlocked at level 34 
Projecting a wider and brighter cone of light. 
-> wide spotlight, high intensity, electronic
